code: @Test public void testCreateMessage() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMinimumMessageCount(1).     String messageBodyToCreate = "Hi from Camel!".     template.sendBody("direct:start", messageBodyToCreate).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     Exchange exchange = mock.getExchanges().get(0).     Messages messages = exchange.getIn().getBody(Messages.class).     assertEquals(1, messages.getMessages().size()).     assertEquals(messageBodyToCreate, messages.getMessages().get(0).getBody().getPlain()). }

public void configure() {     // using dummy keys here since we are mocking out calls to yammer.com with static json. in a real app, please use your own keys!     from("direct:start").to("yammer:messages?consumerKey=aConsumerKey&consumerSecret=aConsumerSecretKey&accessToken=aAccessToken").to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             // using dummy keys here since we are mocking out calls to yammer.com with static json. in a real app, please use your own keys!             from("direct:start").to("yammer:messages?consumerKey=aConsumerKey&consumerSecret=aConsumerSecretKey&accessToken=aAccessToken").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
